despscription: Enclosed by towering palm trees on one side and the alluring Benaulim Beach on the other, Blue Corner Beach Huts & Restaurant features accommodation on a private beach area.

A beachfront paradise that overlooks lush mountains and the sea, Summer Sky Beach Resort sits on Agonda Beach. Equipped with modern amenities and snug fittings, this stunning property offers beach-sty
Surrounded by gardens and blue lagoons, this beach resort in Goa offers luxurious rooms with a DVD player. Facilities include a 12-hole golf course and an outdoor pool. Free Wifi is available.
Mediterranean-inspired Taj Exotica Resort & Spa in Benaulim covers 56+ acres of lush fields facing the Arabian Sea. The garden-view and sea-view villas, deluxe rooms and suites are accompanied.

Sprawled on the golden sands of Agonda Beach, this seafront resort and renowned Goan restaurant is popular for its laid-back cottages, bungalows and rooms amidst unspoilt tropical foliage of South Goa.
Wake up to picturesque sea views and serene cold breeze at O3 Beach Resort. Located on Palolem Beach, this beachfront resort flaunts a funky in-house bar and restaurant.
Located in Agonda, 60 m from Agonda Beach, Agonda Serenity Resort highlights accommodation with an eating joint, free private parking, a bar and a garden.
Beach Street Eco Resort & Spa offers direct access to Mandrem Beach. Beautifully built in tropical-style cottages, the rooms feature minimal and homey furnishings in a warm ambience.
Stay on Agonda Beach surrounded by palm grove at Simrose that has a stone house and quadruple rooms on the ground floor and traditional room on the first floor.
Soaked in vintage charm and modern comforts, Fiesta Beach Resort flaunts an experience of a lifetime with vibrant nightclubs and nightlife at its doorsteps.
Beach Street Eco Resort & Spa offers direct access to Mandrem Beach. Beautifully built in tropical-style cottages, the rooms feature minimal and homey furnishings in a warm ambience.

This rustic-chic resort beside the Arabian Sea provides sea-facing suites with idyllic themes and innovative furnishing. The location and banquet hall at the resort are coveted for weddings and partie
Located on Varca Beach, this resort houses a spectacular 9-hole golf course and offers exhilarating water sports facilities.
Perched atop a hillock with luscious palms and captivating views of Tiracol River and Arabian Sea, Hill Rock is a hotspot for exhilarating adventures like diving and windsurfing. .
Known to be one of the best beach resorts in South Goa, staying at Roundcubeâ€™s laid-back, quaint bungalows gives guests the opportunity to explore the spectacular Palolem beach and hikes, trail.
